878.SG.summary: PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated petrochemical company in Indonesia and Singapore. It operates through Olefin; Polyolefin; Styrene Monomer; Butadiene; Methyl Tertiary Butyl Ethe; and Tanks and Jetty Rental segments. The company offers olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, mixed C4, pyrolysis gasoline, and pyrolysis fuel oil. It also provides polyethylene products, including linear low density and high density polyethylene under the Asrene brand name used in films, injection molding, blow molding, pipe, and monofilament, as well as agriculture films and plastic packaging applications; and resin under the Grene brand name for environmental friendly shopping bags, compost bags, disposal bags, bags on roll, etc. In addition, the company offers polypropylene products, which consist of homopolymer, random copolymer, and impact copolymer under Trilene brand name used for use in flexible packaging, household and industrial appliances, yarn, non-woven bags, furniture, automotive, and electronic parts. Further, it provides styrene monomer that produces polystyrene, expanded polystyrene, styrene acrylonitrile, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS), styrene butadiene rubber (SBR), styrene butadiene latex (SBL), and unsaturated polyester resin for use in shoe soles, drinking cups, food containers, automotive and electronic parts, building block toys, and helmets; and butadiene for the production of ABS, SBL, SBR, and polybutadiene rubber used in rubber boots, rubber gloves, shoe soles, adhesives, and sealants. The company also exports its products. PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

ADMG.JK.summary: PT. Polychem Indonesia Tbk engages in the chemical and polyester businesses. The company operates through Polyester and Petrochemical segments. It offers mono ethylene glycol, di ethylene glycol, tri ethylene glycol, and various ethoxylate products; and petrochemicals. It also provides polyester chips, partially oriented yarns, polyester staple fibers, and drawn textured yarns. The company markets its products in Asia, the Middle East, the United States, Canada, Latin America, Europe, and Africa. PT. Polychem Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

CLPI.JK.summary: PT Colorpak Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and markets printing inks, coatings, and adhesives in Indonesia. The company operates in five segments: Gravure, Film, Adhesive, Coating, and Plastic Resin. It provides flexible and cigarette packaging inks; environmental friendly inks; and PVC leather coatings. The company trades in films, such as bi-axially oriented polypropylene (BOPP), polyethylene terephthalate (PET) film, NYLON, MPET, Aluminium foil, and special films; and solvent base and solventless adhesives; and plastic resins. In addition, it offers various types of liquid inks, including Uniprint Series, a Polyurethane based ink; Cenote, an Ester and Alcohol based ink for PET and OPP; New Unicom for PET dry and extrusion; New Lamiop for BOPP dry and extrusion; D-Lamiop for OPP dry; Hunter for foil, paper, and paper board; Alpha for printing on PP and PE surfaces; Roto Shrink for sleeves PVC and PET; and Fantasy PP for woven bag PP. PT Colorpak Indonesia Tbk also exports its products to Australia and China. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Colorpak Indonesia Tbk is a subsidiary of Ink Color International Pte. Ltd.

DPNS.JK.summary: PT Duta Pertiwi Nusantara Tbk engages in the glue, chemical, and mining businesses in Indonesia. It operates through two divisions, Glue Industry and Coal Mining. The company offers urea formaldehyde, phenol formaldehyde, urea melamine formaldehyde, and particle board glues and hardeners; semi-finished products, including formaldehyde; hardeners for producing plywood; and additives, such as emission bonding agents, etc. It is also involved in mining coal. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Pontianak, Indonesia. PT Duta Pertiwi Nusantara Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Dutapermana Makmur.

EKAD.JK.summary: PT Ekadharma International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and markets self-adhesive tapes in Indonesia and Malaysia. The company offers aluminum foil, anti-slip, cloth, double foam, double side, Kraft, masking, metalizing, OPP, OPP printing, PVC electrical insulation, and stationery tapes; stretch films; epoxy, water, and white glues; and glue sticks under the DAIMARU, SUPERFIX, and EKATAPE brands. It is also involved in the trading of carton sealers and stretch wrappers. The company was formerly known as PT Ekadharma Widya Grafika and changed its name to PT Ekadharma International Tbk in 2006. PT Ekadharma International Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Ekadharma International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Ekadharma Inti Perkasa.

FPNI.JK.summary: PT Lotte Chemical Titan Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, produces and distributes polyethylene products in Indonesia. It produces high density polyethylene, low density polyethylene, and linear low density polyethylene products; and polypropylene homopolymers, and polypropylene random and impact copolymers, as well as imports BOPP films. The company is also involved in the wholesale trade of polyethylene and polypropylene. The company was formerly known as P.T. Titan Kimia Nusantara Tbk and changed its name to PT Lotte Chemical Titan Tbk in April 2013. PT Lotte Chemical Titan Tbk was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Lotte Chemical Titan Tbk is a subsidiary of Lotte Chemical Titan International Sdn. Bhd.

INCF.JK.summary: PT Indo Komoditi Korpora Tbk engages rubber, dry jelutung, and maklon service businesses. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.

INCI.JK.summary: PT Intanwijaya Internasional Tbk manufactures and sells formaldehyde and formaldehyde resin products primarily in Indonesia. The company offers formalin, urea formaldehyde resin, melamine urea formaldehyde resin, phenol formaldehyde resin, urea formaldehyde powder, hardener, catcher, and other products primarily for plywood, block board, and particle board industries. It is also involved in real estate business. The company exports its products. The company was formerly known as PT Intan Wijaya Chemical Industry and changed its name to PT Intanwijaya Internasional Tbk in June 2000. PT Intanwijaya Internasional Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

LTLS.JK.summary: PT Lautan Luas Tbk manufactures and distributes basic and specialty chemicals for industrial end-users primarily in Indonesia and the Asia-Pacific region. It operates through three segments: Distribution, Manufacturing, and Services. The company provides laboratory services and solutions for textile, paper, electroplating, leather, and water treatment industries, as well as offers integrated logistics and supply chain, waste water treatment, and information technology solutions. It serves the agriculture, animal feed, coating, electroplating, food and beverages, glass and ceramic, leather, mining and smelter, oil field, packaging, personal and home care, plastic and rubber, pulp and paper, sugar, textile, and water treatment industries. The company was formerly known as Perusahaan Andil Maskapai Dagang dan Industri Lim Teck Lee and changed its name to PT Lautan Luas Tbk in 1965. The company was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in West Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Lautan Luas Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Caturkarsa Megatunggal.

MDKI.JK.summary: PT Emdeki Utama Tbk produces and sells calcium carbide in Indonesia and India. The company also produces air conditioners. The company was founded in 1981 and is based in Gresik, Indonesia. PT Emdeki Utama Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Emde Industri Investama.

P2I.F.summary: PT. Polychem Indonesia Tbk engages in the chemical and polyester businesses. The company operates through Polyester and Petrochemical segments. It offers mono ethylene glycol, di ethylene glycol, tri ethylene glycol, and various ethoxylate products; and petrochemicals. It also provides polyester chips, partially oriented yarns, polyester staple fibers, and drawn textured yarns. The company markets its products in Asia, the Middle East, the United States, Canada, Latin America, Europe, and Africa. PT. Polychem Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

POLY.JK.summary: PT Asia Pacific Fibers Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the chemical and synthetic fiber manufacturing, weaving and knitting, and other activities related to the textile industry in Indonesia. The company offers purified terephthalic acids, regular and specialized polyester chips, staple fibers, filament yarns, and fleece fabrics products. It also trades in textile products; and produces ready to wear garments and accessories, as well as provides financial services. The company's products are used in various apparel, furnishing, and industrial textile applications. It serves customers in Europe, the United States, Asia, Africa, Australia, and the Middle East. The company was formerly known as PT Polysindo Eka Perkasa Tbk and changed its name to PT Asia Pacific Fibers Tbk in December 2009. The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Asia Pacific Fibers Tbk is a subsidiary of Damiano Investments B.V.

PTCAY.summary: PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated petrochemical company in Indonesia and Singapore. It operates through Olefin; Polyolefin; Styrene Monomer; Butadiene; Methyl Tertiary Butyl Ethe; and Tanks and Jetty Rental segments. The company offers olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, mixed C4, pyrolysis gasoline, and pyrolysis fuel oil. It also provides polyethylene products, including linear low density and high density polyethylene under the Asrene brand name used in films, injection molding, blow molding, pipe, and monofilament, as well as agriculture films and plastic packaging applications; and resin under the Grene brand name for environmental friendly shopping bags, compost bags, disposal bags, bags on roll, etc. In addition, the company offers polypropylene products, which consist of homopolymer, random copolymer, and impact copolymer under Trilene brand name used for use in flexible packaging, household and industrial appliances, yarn, non-woven bags, furniture, automotive, and electronic parts. Further, it provides styrene monomer that produces polystyrene, expanded polystyrene, styrene acrylonitrile, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS), styrene butadiene rubber (SBR), styrene butadiene latex (SBL), and unsaturated polyester resin for use in shoe soles, drinking cups, food containers, automotive and electronic parts, building block toys, and helmets; and butadiene for the production of ABS, SBL, SBR, and polybutadiene rubber used in rubber boots, rubber gloves, shoe soles, adhesives, and sealants. The company also exports its products. PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

It operates through Olefin; Polyolefin; Styrene Monomer; Butadiene; Methyl Tertiary Butyl Ethe; and Tanks and Jetty Rental segments. The company offers olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, mixed C4, pyrolysis gasoline, and pyrolysis fuel oil. It also provides polyethylene products, including linear low density and high density polyethylene under the Asrene brand name used in films, injection molding, blow molding, pipe, and monofilament, as well as agriculture films and plastic packaging applications; and resin under the Grene brand name for environmental friendly shopping bags, compost bags, disposal bags, bags on roll, etc. In addition, the company offers polypropylene products, which consist of homopolymer, random copolymer, and impact copolymer under Trilene brand name used for use in flexible packaging, household and industrial appliances, yarn, non-woven bags, furniture, automotive, and electronic parts. Further, it provides styrene monomer that produces polystyrene, expanded polystyrene, styrene acrylonitrile, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS), styrene butadiene rubber (SBR), styrene butadiene latex (SBL), and unsaturated polyester resin for use in shoe soles, drinking cups, food containers, automotive and electronic parts, building block toys, and helmets; and butadiene for the production of ABS, SBL, SBR, and polybutadiene rubber used in rubber boots, rubber gloves, shoe soles, adhesives, and sealants. The company also exports its products. PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

TDPM.JK.summary: PT Tridomain Performance Materials Tbk manufactures and sells high performance specialty materials in Indonesia. It offers waterbased resins, solvent-based coating resins, and unsaturated polyester resins, as well as plasticizers and acrylamides. The company's products are used in infrastructure, construction, automotive, environmental, and manufacturing industries. It also operates in the Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Australia, and New Zealand. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Tridomain Performance Materials Tbk is a subsidiary of DH Corporation Ltd.

TPIA.JK.summary: PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated petrochemical company in Indonesia and Singapore. It operates through Olefin; Polyolefin; Styrene Monomer; Butadiene; Methyl Tertiary Butyl Ethe; and Tanks and Jetty Rental segments. The company offers olefins, such as ethylene, propylene, mixed C4, pyrolysis gasoline, and pyrolysis fuel oil. It also provides polyethylene products, including linear low density and high density polyethylene under the Asrene brand name used in films, injection molding, blow molding, pipe, and monofilament, as well as agriculture films and plastic packaging applications; and resin under the Grene brand name for environmental friendly shopping bags, compost bags, disposal bags, bags on roll, etc. In addition, the company offers polypropylene products, which consist of homopolymer, random copolymer, and impact copolymer under Trilene brand name used for use in flexible packaging, household and industrial appliances, yarn, non-woven bags, furniture, automotive, and electronic parts. Further, it provides styrene monomer that produces polystyrene, expanded polystyrene, styrene acrylonitrile, acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS), styrene butadiene rubber (SBR), styrene butadiene latex (SBL), and unsaturated polyester resin for use in shoe soles, drinking cups, food containers, automotive and electronic parts, building block toys, and helmets; and butadiene for the production of ABS, SBL, SBR, and polybutadiene rubber used in rubber boots, rubber gloves, shoe soles, adhesives, and sealants. The company also exports its products. PT. Chandra Asri Petrochemical Tbk is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.
